title: aaspharmacy
author: aaspharmacy
content: Bitcoin accepted at AAS Pharmacy.to, your source for anabolic steroids! Do you pay in bitcoin? Do you find the process easy or hard? Some clients don't seem to have any issues where as others get frustrated and give up. Please share your thoughts and experiences below!

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: It could be maybe better to post it here : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=51.0
